items.sentence: Tom was the one who inspired me to do this.
Tom and Mary both don\'t know how to drive.
What makes you think I\'d want to see that?
He that will steal an egg will steal an ox.
I could never make him believe what I said.
I could tell that Tom had been working out.
I could tell that Tom was in a lot of pain.
I could write Tom a note if you want me to.
Tom waited for Mary in front of the school.
Tom was about to fall, but Mary caught him.
Tom was reading a letter written in French.
Tom was too scared to walk home by himself.
Tom went to the market to buy some oranges.
I think I\'m going to learn a lot from you.
I think I\'m really not any good at French.
I think I\'m really not any good at German.
I think I\'m responsible for what happened.
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t want to do that.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t willing to help.
Tom knew that he didn\'t have enough money.
I thought you wouldn\'t want to go with us.
Tom told me his father was in the hospital.
Tom took a butcher knife out of the drawer.
Tom tossed his dirty clothes in the hamper.
Tom translated a French novel into English.
Tom was embarrassed by his son\'s behavior.
Tom was embarrassed that he\'d been fooled.
I met my teacher on the way to the station.
Tom spent his thirtieth birthday in Boston.
I haven\'t finished painting the fence yet.
I honestly didn\'t think Tom would be here.
Tom and Mary are going to be there tonight.
Tom and Mary are going to get married soon.
Tom and Mary are much stronger than we are.
Tom and Mary are very comfortable together.
She loves him now more than she did before.
She often takes advantage of his ignorance.
She said nothing that would make him angry.
I forgot to attach a stamp to the envelope.
I found them lying on the artificial grass.
I got a flat tire on the way to work today.
Tom drank too much at the party last night.
Tom dropped us off in front of the station.
Tom doesn\'t trust anybody else to do that.
Tom doesn\'t understand why Mary does that.
The police found three wallets in your car.
The police officer placed Tom under arrest.
The police officer wore a bulletproof vest.
The police think that Tom knows who did it.
Tom said he couldn\'t understand my French.
